DOC.brief_title: Neocytolysis Treatment Renal Anemia With Erythropoieses Stimulating Agents ( ESA )
DOC.criteria: sign informed consent age > 18 year , dialysis dependent chronic renal failure hemodialysis three time week Kt/V > 1,2 od URR > 65 % hemoglobin 11 13 g/dl within last 2 month hemoglobin change +/ 1g/dl within last 4 week ESA least 8 week Ferritin > 300 ng/ml Tsat > 25 % Significant bleeding last 8 week blood transfusion within last 8 week hemoglobin disorder hemolysis Malignant disease Significant inflammation Acute infection CRP > 30 mg/l Temporary vascular dialysis access Vitamin B12 deficiency Folic acid deficiency Not control hyperparathyroidism Not control hypertension Epilepsia within thze last 6 month Thrombocyte count > 500 x 10^9 /l
